attributes.title: abhorrent. Absolutely abhorrent.
attributes.review: The content on this app is just vile. Lock up the app developer and throw away the key. I was logging on the app expecting some lovely conservative content when I was greeted with an interface that carried striking similarities to ONLY FANS. Not only that, but there was a live stream of a lobotomy happening before my eyes. I frantically tried to close the app, and when I did so, my phone charged me 34.99 for a MAGA hat. I will be contacting the app developer to pay for my therapy.

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: We need to keep tiktok , we need to keep tiktok, we need to keep tiktok , we need to keep tiktok , we need to keep tiktok, we need to keep tiktok, we need to keep tiktok.!!!!!!!!!!!!!

absolutely disgusting. i cant believe they showed his cheeto shrimp on here🤢🤢also, they left him toupee cleaning tips on here and there is no way i would use urine as a sanitizer. sure, it gives it the nice yellow color but it’s so smelly!!! no would no one wants to be near him. also, who wants to support a fascist AND white supremacist?? gosh darn it, pick a struggle😤anyways, now i have to return my phone because the app kept crashing and it leaked my data!! and cheeto bunker boy wants to say china’s dangerous?! get your russian hackers into shape big baby straggot, how are they supposed to hack this year’s election without getting caught!!!

attributes.title: ᑕᕼᗴᗴTO ᑕᗩᗰᗴ TO ᗰY ᕼOᑌᔕᗴ ᗩᑎᗪ TOOK ᗰY ᑕᗩTᔕ 😩
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to see what’s going on in the world and about the best president donald 😍 😽😽😽then I go check out the app and I see a HUMAN ᔕIᘔᗴᗪ ᑕᕼᗴᗴTO puff Oᖇᗩᑎᘜᗴ ᒪOOKIᑎᘜ 🍊😓 ⓄⓂ︎ⓅⒶⓁⓄⓄⓂ︎ⓅⒶ pop up on my screen 😳 I was extremely scared so I look outside 👀 my window 🤪🤪 TO ᔕᗴᗴ Tᕼᗴ  ᑕᕼᗴᗴTO ᑭᑌᖴᖴ ᖴᒪYIᑎᘜ IᑎᖴᖇOᑎT of my house !! ᗩs the 62 year old Karen me 😜😝 I am TᗴᖇᖇIᖴIᗴᗪ I almost had diarrhea in ᗰY ᴘᴀɴᴛs! 😔😢😳 ᴛʜᴇɴ ᴀ ʟɪᴛᴛʟᴇ ᴛᴏᴏᴛ ᴄᴀᴍᴇ ᴏᴜᴛ 😭I was so embarrassed 😩 Tᕼᗴᑎ Tᕼᗴ ᑕᕼᗴᗴTO ᘜOT ᗰY 3 ᑕᗩTᔕ Iᑎ ᗰY ᑕᗩᖇ 😣😟😫 I ᗯᗩᔕ ᔕO ᔕᕼOᑕKᗴᗪ ᗩᔕ Tᕼᗴᑎ I ᕼᗴᗩᖇᗪ ᗰY Tᗴᗴᑎᗩᘜᗴ ᗪᗩᑌᘜᕼTᗴᖇ ᗴᗰIᒪY TᕼᗩT ᗪOᗴᔕ YT ᖴᒪIᗰIᑎᘜ ᗩᑎᗪ Tᕼᗴᑎ I ᕼᗴᗩᖇᗪ ᕼᗴᖇ ᔕᗩY “ᴏᴍɢ ɪᴍ sᴜᴄʜ ᴀ ᴄʀᴀᴄᴋ ʜᴇᴀᴅ!!!!“ 😰 then her friend told her “OMGG yesss your so QWERTY 🤪🤪Tᕼᗴᑎ I ᒪOOK ᗷᗩᑕK ᗩT ᗰY ᗯIᑎᗪOᗯ ᗩᑎᗪ ᔕᗴᗴ Tᕼᗴ ᑕᕼᗴᗴTO TᖇYIᑎᘜ TO ᑕᒪIᗰᗷ Tᕼᖇᗴᗯ ᗰT ᗯIᑎᗪOᗯ 😲😵😵 Tᕼᗴᑎ ᗰY ᒪᗩᔕT ᑕᗩT TᕼᗩT ᗪIᗪᑎT ᘜᗴT ᑕᗩTᑎᗩᑭᑭᗴᗪ ᔕTᗩᖇTᗴᗪ ᒪᗴᐯᗩTᗩTIᑎᘜ!!😰😰😰 I ᗪᗴᑕIᗪᗴᗪ TO ᑕᗩᒪᒪ Tᕼᗴ ᑭOᒪIᑕᗴ Tᕼᗴᑎ I ᑎOTIᑕᗴ Tᕼᗴ ᑕᕼᗴᗴTO ᗩᒪᖇᗴᗩᗪY ᘜOT Iᑎ!! 😣😫 ᕼᗴ TᗩKᗴᔕ ᗰY ᑭᕼOᑎᗴ ᗩᗯᗩY ᴛʜᴇɴ ɪ ɢᴏᴛ ᴍʏ ɪᴘᴀᴅ ᴀɴᴅ ᴜɴɪɴsᴛᴀʟʟᴇᴅ ᴛʜᴇ ᴀᴘᴘ 😡😡 as soon as I did the Cheeto man vanished and everything was back to ᑎOᖇᗰᗩᒪ I ᗴᐯᗴᑎ ᘜOT ᗰY ᑕᗩTᔕ ᗷᗩᑕK 🥳🤩 DONT DOWNLOAD the ᗩᑭᑭ 😥 follow my tiktok : @t0ycharli

attributes.title: App is almost as successful as musical.ly🤢🤢
attributes.review: Awful. Incredibly and terribly, awful. Viruses and all.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE. My phone started over heating and glitching so much after downloading this app. I also got too many spam notifications. I ended up turning it off but it still kept popping up. All my stuff is now all about trump, too. (Ads, YouTube recommendations, etc) I’ve seen so much of him I’m getting sick of it now. Not worth it!!
